articles.author: Paul McLeary, Jacopo Barigazzi
articles.title: ‘The rules of the game have changed’: Europe fears an unreliable US ally - POLITICO
articles.description: European defense leaders are preparing for a tense gathering with the Trump team.
articles.content:
And while allies have experience navigating the disruptions and uncertainties of the U.S. president, this administration is a more expansionist and aggressive one than theyve faced before.

articles.author: Laura Kayali
articles.title: NATO ministers plead for Ukraine to be involved in Trump-Putin peace talks - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: But alliance chief Mark Rutte was keen to downplay fears that Europe and Kyiv are being sidelined.
articles.content: "You also forget to mention that [Trump] also had a long phone call with [Ukraine] President Zelenskyy," he said. "There's a clear convergence emerging: We all want peace in Ukraine, rather sooner th… [+987 chars]
